content: --दत्त {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} god-given, granted by the gods. {2} given to the gods (as a village, &c.). (--त्तः {1} <ab>N.</ab> of the conch-shell of Arjuna; <ls>Bg. 1. 15.</ls> {2} a certain person (used in speaking of men indefinitely); देवदत्तः पचति, पीनो देवदत्तो दिवा न भुंक्ते &c. {3} one of the vital airs exhaled in yawning; देवदत्तो विजृंभणे, °अग्रजः <ab>N.</ab> of Buddha.
